web_snippets: Craig Czury (poet, editor, arts advocate) is from the Wilkes-Barre area of Pennsylvania and the author of over 20 books of poetry.
Craig Czury (born March 10, 1951, in Kingston) is an American poet. Craig Czury. Born, (1951-03-10) March 10, 1951 (age 74)
